s3games.gui

Class RobotWindow

  • java.lang.Object
    • s3games.gui.ControlWindow
      • s3games.gui.RobotWindow
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class RobotWindow
extends ControlWindow
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
    A simple control window for letting the user control when to make a new move with the robot arm, and perhaps do some other operations on the robot
